enabled.description: if this profile should be used

name.description: the name of the command this profile matches

name_expression.description: a regex pattern that must match the command name

which.description: a full path to the command that this profile belongs to

arg_patterns.description: a list of patterns that must match command arguments

min_args.description: minimum number of arguments the command must have

max_args.description: maximum number of arguments the command must have

timestamp.description: prepend a timestamp to output lines, can be true or an strftime format

less_output.description: send the output through the less command when finished

tty.description: run the command in a pseudo-terminal environment

soft_reset_eol.description: append a soft reset, %Cs, at the end of each line

from_profiles.description: include the patterns from these named profiles
